title: Spotlights: Nadia Tass
brief_description: A film director, producer and actress, originally from Florina, Macedonia, northern Greece, who moved to Australia in the 1960s. She began her career as an actress appearing in the television series Prisoner (1979–86) Her first feature film was the now iconic Malcolm (1986).

constellations_primary.name: Nadia Tass
constellations_primary.description: Comedic and cult classics take centre stage in Nadia Tass' career.

description: Nadia Tass is a director, producer and actress, originally from Florina, Macedonia, northern Greece, who moved to Australia in the 1960s. She began her career as an actress appearing in the television series Prisoner (1979–86) Her first feature film was the now iconic Malcolm (1986), which she co-wrote.
description_for_label: Nadia Tass is a director, producer and actress, originally from Florina, Macedonia, northern Greece, who moved to Australia in the 1960s. She began her career as an actress appearing in the television series Prisoner (1979–86) Her first feature film was the now iconic Malcolm (1986), which she co-wrote.
